title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.12 - Osteopathy scholarships
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.12 - Osteopathy scholarships

State Regulations
(a) Upon budget authorization for award of additional Regents scholarships for the
professional study of osteopathy, such awards shall be made under the same
standards and conditions as are established under subdivision 3 of section 605
and other pertinent sections of the Education Law, except that, if such budget
authorization specifically extends eligibility to students who have already
begun professional study of osteopathy, then such students shall also be
admitted to the competition, if otherwise qualified. (b) Unless otherwise prescribed by law, such
osteopathy scholarships shall be awarded to all candidates who obtain a score
in the competitive examination that would equal or exceed the score that would
be required to receive a scholarship award or reaward in medicine in the
geographic area in which the candidate is eligible to compete, as determined by
the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
